title: Wrapper class for the GROMACS genrestr (http://manual.gromacs.org/current/onlinehelp/gmx-genrestr.html) module.

input_structure_path.description: Path to the input structure PDB, GRO or TPR format.

input_ndx_path.description: Path to the input GROMACS index file, NDX format.

output_itp_path.description: Path the output ITP topology file with restrains.

restrained_group.description: Index group that will be restrained.

force_constants.description: Array of three floats defining the force constants

gmx_path.description: Path to the GROMACS executable binary.

restart.description: [WF property] Do not execute if output files exist.

container_path.description: Path to the binary executable of your container.

container_volume_path.description: Path to an internal directory in the container.

container_working_dir.description: Path to the internal CWD in the container.

container_user_id.description: User number id to be mapped inside the container.

container_shell_path.description: Path to the binary executable of the container shell.
